news.title: Higgs Boson is discovered thanks to LHC
news.description: Greek LHC spokesman announces one big discovery.
news.content: I might not be an expert but it's pretty obvious that this is all fake. An intention to distract people from what really matters here: THEY ARE FUCKING UP THE WORLD LITTLE BY LITTLE!!

news.title: More LHC earthqueakes
news.content: One more earthquake! In this case near New York City. Of course mr Posmopulopilos Polululus is again saying there's no relation BUT THE WRATH OF GOD WILL BE LIMITLESS DUE TO THIS ****** ACTS. HOW LONG DO WE HAVE TO LET THEM **** THINGS UP??!!

news.title: EU: Silence over LHC clousure after unestabilities
news.description: After last earthquake in Indonesia there have been no response from mr. Porupilapolos
news.content: From this media an email was send to him in order to get some explanations, I WROTE THAT MYSELF!! AND THAT ****SUCKER DIDN'T EVEN ANSWER. He probably believes that he is more important than you my 300 followers, but we are attending a last meeting to accept the end og the world.
